word_mean: 发育不全，成形不全：一个器官或组织，或者一个器官或组织的细胞产物发育不全。参见agenesis和hypoplasia

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To explore the treatment of pure red cell aplasia ( PRCA ) after ABO - incompatible alloge - neic peripheral blood stem cell transplantation.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 探讨ABO血型不合异基因外周血干细胞移植后纯红细胞再生障碍性贫血 ( PRCA ) 的治疗.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To investigate the diagnosis, etiology, pathogenesis and therapy of pure red cell aplasia ( PRCA ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 探讨纯 红细胞 再生障碍性 贫血 的病因 、 发病机制、诊断和治疗.
